channel.title: Windows 7 Hosting?
channel.description:
Alright, So i have Windows 7, and I did everything it tells me to on how to start a server. I am attempting to host a Z525 Based Server.
Is there some sort of different way to host?
I Have:
[ol][li]JDK[/li] [li]No-Ip[/li] [li]uTorrent[/li] [li]Source[/li] [li]Client[/li] [li]Set Enviromental Variables[/li][/ol]
Still doesnt work? Any help?

item.title: Windows 7 Hosting?
item.dc:creator: @Emchie Emchie
item.description:
@Emchie wrote:

Alright, So i have Windows 7, and I did everything it tells me to on how to start a server. I am attempting to host a Z525 Based Server.

Is there some sort of different way to host?
